TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyDefinition extends System.Windows.Markup.MemberDefinition

Docs.summary: Supports a markup technique of defining properties of a class in declarative XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Support for the overall feature of defining members of a class in declarative XAML is not self-contained in this API. This API only provides the markup definitions that make the declarations possible in XAML. The actual build task handling of how such XAML is interpreted is specific to individual build tasks and the frameworks or technologies that reference them.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the access level of the defined property.
Docs.value: The access level of the defined property, as a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string provided here is interpreted in the context of the build action. Build actions are potentially language-dependent and might use the access level keyword conventions of that language.
